content.3: Thou shalt not eat any abominable thing.
content.5: The hart, and the roebuck, and the fallow deer, and the wild goat, and the pygarg, and the wild ox, and the chamois.
content.6: And every beast that parteth the hoof, and cleaveth the cleft into two claws,
content.7: Nevertheless these ye shall not eat of them that chew the cud, or of them that divide the cloven hoof;
content.8: And the swine, because it divideth the hoof, yet cheweth not the cud, it

content.10: And whatsoever hath not fins and scales ye may not eat; it
content.13: And the glede, and the kite, and the vulture after his kind,
content.14: And every raven after his kind,
content.15: And the owl, and the night hawk, and the cuckow, and the hawk after his kind,
content.16: The little owl, and the great owl, and the swan,
content.17: And the pelican, and the gier eagle, and the cormorant,
content.18: And the stork, and the heron after her kind, and the lapwing, and the bat.

content.22: Thou shalt truly tithe all the increase of thy seed, that the field bringeth forth year by year.

content.24: And if the way be too long for thee, so that thou art not able to carry it;
